attributes.action: Make Vicky Pollard's tracksuit the national school uniform
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have a new idea for the national school uniform. The country is full of chavs and who is a better style icon for chavs than Vicky Pollard of Little Britain? Everyone should wear my tracksuit so that all kids can be as well chavved up as her, such an imprtant national trend should be standardised immediately. It will make the avergae GCSE result up to a grade D.

 Sign if you agree please. Lets make VICKY POLLARD the next model - no more size zeros! Pink tracksuits for all!

Yeah or noooo?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
